TopicTitle: Kerbal Space Program 1.0 HUGE WINGS EXCLUSIVE PREVIEW!!!

Articles.Content:
Oh my god guys, I got contacted by one of Squad members and got exclusive preview of the upcoming big wing parts. It looks gorgeous. I have been allowed to share it here because nobody would believe me anyway, so here it is:

[http://imgur.com/3jUbZrt](http://imgur.com/3jUbZrt)

I love it. So ergonomic. Can't wait to test it out ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

***EPIC FEATURES:***

***WORD "FLY" ON THE WING***

***AN ENTIRE 300M LONG***

***SO BIG IT WON'T FIT IN THE SPH***

***EXTREMELY LITTLE AMOUNT OF POLYGONS! ONLY 20 POLYGONS IN TOTAL!***

***CREATES MASSIVE AMOUNTS OF LAG DUE TO KRAKEN PHYSICS***

***DOES NOT OBEY AERODYNAMICS***

***CONTAINS 1337 UNITS OF FUEL***

***CONTAINS 69 ELECTROCHARGE***

***AND.......***

***FLY'S WITHOUT CONTROL SURFACES!***

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-01T16:05:10Z" title="04/01/2015 04:05  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 1, 2015</time> by 2001kraft**

Since it's 1 april today, I'm not even going to click it.

Hah!

Aw, come on! I was so hyped to see it ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

But it's hilarious!
I think that will be a \*great\* addition to the game
Exclusive preview? Why would I care for that since V1.0 released 4 hours ago!

> 
> Oh my god guys, I got contacted by one of Squad members and got exclusive preview of the upcoming big wing parts. It looks gorgeous. I have been allowed to share it here because nobody would believe me anyway, so here it is:
> [http://imgur.com/gallery/bHMqr](http://imgur.com/gallery/bHMqr)
> 
> I love it. So ergonomic. Can't wait to test it out ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

xD these Aprils fools pranks get me evey time!
**version 1.0 is looking amazing!!**

> 
> **version 1.0 is looking amazing!!**

IKR!

I love how they made the KSC on EVE!
As a moderator i would like to point out there is a swear word on one of your pictures.
Not bad, would look great in stock. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
I swear I've seen this on an April Fools Day before...

Wat.

Not to mention we're all *green*.
This april fools prank is much better than the one several weeks ago.

> 
> Since it's 1 april today, I'm not even going to click it.
> Hah!

Since it's april 1st, i'm gonna click it, I could use a laugh.

Also, it's april 1st. Comic Sans is mandatory.
Why s everyone's name green?

**Comic**Sans MS. I get it. Also everyone has turned GREEN, the moderators have replaced their avatars with stuff drawn in paint and the Red Iron Crown appears to be a Curious George. I understand why but I don't get the joke.

EDIT: Hey, it doesn't let you describe yourself as a moderator if you aren't one. Not fair. They should have allowed it for today ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

I accidentally posted a new pic in the OP, so here's the update picture of the

**BIG WINGS IN KSP! POSSIBLY THE BEST ADDITION TO THE GAME \*EVER\*!**

[http://imgur.com/3jUbZrt](http://imgur.com/3jUbZrt)

ALREADY IN UNITY! WILL COME IN UPCOMING 1.0 UPDATE CONFIRMED! SQUAD scolded me for giving the wrong pic. sorry D:
